name: Average
description:
Average is a minimalist puzzle game with two rules:

  • Average two blocks into one
  • Win by leaving only two blocks

There are 10 puzzles, increasing in difficulty.

Made with processing.

Made for the united game jam 2020 with a theme of two.

It fits the theme because you combine two blocks.

I used https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1 for sound effects and music.
